name: Cute kitten virtual pet, your own kitty to take care
name_original: Cute kitten virtual pet, your own kitty to take care
description:
Take care of your virtual kitten all day, is free, your animal companion cat.
Cute kitten gives you your own virtual cat. You have to care for, feed, clean, play with it and sleep it.
You can also put ins and accessories to make him happy.
If you pet will purr. He loves to play with balls, click on them to the chase cute kitten by exploiting appear very curious effects and more balls.
You have a level of 'augmented reality', to make it look real and another level of fireworks and several minigames.

Attention moms and dads
This application has a level suitable for babies and toddlers. At that level there is no advertising or buttons, only the cat-piano and many skins. To return to the beginning, press 'Back' in its central top.

Characteristics:
- Play over 5 mini-games with your virtual pet animals. So many things you can buy with the points.
- You can interact with your cat by clicking on objects such as balls or furniture, carpet playing running comes to you, it's very cute.
- Care and respects your lovely pet, it's free!
- The game never ends. Every day your kitten grows and changes your skin if it is dirty! - To give food, being in the kitchen, touching the plate of food or drink for your cute kitten can eat.
- This kitten is very realistic, has several rooms to move and play, even if you are alone!
- Realistic 3D graphics, cutest virtual pet feline
- You can choose between 3 cats at first, they are all very nice!
- Level for babies: no ads and no buttons, your baby can touch the piano kitty!
- Virtual Reality to see your cute kitty in the real world!
